isis.stitle: T 444E Diesel Engine Diagnostics (1997) - SECTION 5.3: MULTIMETER USE - TROUBLESHOOTING - CHECK FOR CAUSE OF THE PROBLEM

svcproc.title: CHECK FOR CAUSE OF THE PROBLEM
svcproc.para: Diagnosis charts are provided for many of the common faults that may occur. Refer to these charts in each section. Follow the procedures in the chart until the cause of the problem is located.
If the particular symptom found in the problem circuit is not covered by a diagnosis chart, refer to the general electrical troubleshooting information provided under "Electrical Test Equipment".
